TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChangePasswordDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具中，為 Web 伺服器控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換到設計檢視中，標記原始程式碼描述控制會剖析並在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當您切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項就會保存標記原始程式碼，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別時，它會建立相關聯控制項或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

summary.span: 取得自動格式化配置的集合，這些配置將顯示在 [自動格式化] 對話方塊中。

span.span: Gets the collection of automatic format schemes that will be displayed in the **Auto Format** dialog box.

value.span: ，其中包含 的預先定義配置。

span.span: A that contains the predefined schemes for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目物件衍生自類別，並從內部定義的 XML 編碼常數字串填入。The elements of the object are derived from the class and are populated from internally defined XML-encoded constant strings.

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來呈現關聯控制項的標記。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來呈現關聯控制項的標記。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: ，其中包含在設計階段用來呈現 的標記。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定相關聯的模式控制項，可以是複本，目前的實際控制項模式。The method sets the mode of the associated control, which can be a copy, to the current mode of the actual control. 接下來，它會強制重新建立，子控制項，然後呼叫基底方法，產生標記。Next, it forces the child controls to be recreated, and then calls the base method to generate the markup. 如果發生錯誤，呼叫預留位置產生標記的方法。If an error occurs, the calls the method to generate the markup for a placeholder.

para.span: 如果您覆寫方法時，務必呼叫基底的方法，因為最後呼叫上控制項或一份要產生標記的控制項。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method, because it eventually calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml (regions As DesignerRegionCollection) As String

param.name: regions
param.span: ，其中已加入關聯控制項目前檢視的定義。

span.span: A to which a definition of the current view of the associated control has been added.

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來呈現關聯控制項的標記，並填入設計工具區域的集合。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.

returns.span: ，其中包含在設計階段用來呈現 的標記。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫方法以產生設計階段呈現標記控制項。The method calls the method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the control. 它也會加入物件`regions`參數描述的目前檢視控制項。It also adds a object to the `regions` parameter that describes the current view of the control.

para.span: 如果您覆寫方法時，務必呼叫基底的方法，因為最後呼叫上控制項或一份要產生標記的控制項。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method, because it eventually calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

summary.span: 取得關聯控制項目前樣板的永續性表單。

span.span: Gets the persisted form of the current template of the associated control.

returns.span: ，包含關聯 目前樣板的永續性表單。

span.span: A containing the persisted form of the current template of the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會序列化目前範本 (或屬性) 的成保存的形式，也就是控制標記文字的物件。The method serializes the current template (the or property) of the control to its persisted form, which is a object of markup text. 此保存的形式附加在一起的序列化的子控制項所組成。This persisted form consists of the serialized child controls appended together.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(class System.Exception e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetErrorDesignTimeHtml (e As Exception) As String

param.name: e
param.span: 在建立或呈現關聯的控制項時，擲回的 。

span.span: The that was thrown while creating or rendering the associated control.

summary.span: 取得呈現給替代符號的標記，此替代符號包含在設計階段嘗試建立或呈現關聯的控制項時發生錯誤的相關資訊。

span.span: Gets the markup that renders to a placeholder containing information about the error that occurred while attempting to create or render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 包含指定例外狀況相關資訊的替代符號之標記。

span.span: The markup for the placeholder that contains information about the specified exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預留位置包含類型和控制項名稱、 錯誤訊息，而相關聯的屬性`e`參數。The placeholder contains the type and control names, an error message, and the property that is associated with the `e` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , which implements .

summary.span: 準備設計工具，以檢視、編輯和設計關聯控制項。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具主應用程式呼叫方法準備好要用來呈現的設計工具時控制項。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 以及其基底方法設定屬性，並連接事件所需的設計工具的作業。The method and its base methods configure properties and connect events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`參數是與這個設計工具或一份所指定的控制項相關聯的控制項`component`。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of the control specified by `component`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 集合，實作已加入和已遮蔽屬性的 。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供設計工具使用，以便在 [屬性] 方格的顯示中移除或加入其他屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove or add additional properties for display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制設計工具使用衍生自方法陰影各種控制項屬性與對應的設計階段屬性在設計工具實作，並且將加入或移除屬性的方法**屬性**方格。Control designers use methods derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 如控制項，方法會設定屬性`false`不適用於範本的屬性 (會移除從**屬性**方格) 當使用者的範本已定義。For the control, the method sets the attribute to `false` for properties that do not apply to templates (removes them from the **Properties** grid) when a user template has been defined.

para.span: 覆寫方法，以將屬性加入到或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderOuterTable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指定 控制項是否使用外部資料表容器來套用內嵌 CSS 樣式規則。

span.span: Specifies whether the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.

value.span: 如果控制項使用外部資料表容器來套用內嵌 CSS 樣式規則，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項使用的外部資料表容器套用在標記中的內嵌樣式規則。The control uses an outer table container to apply inline style rule in the markup. 您可以移除外部表格容器，此屬性設定為 true。You can remove the outer table container by setting this property to true. 移除外部資料表，讓您更大彈性如何呈現控制項的標記來套用 CSS 規則。Removing the outer table gives you greater flexibility in how you apply CSS rules to the markup that is rendered by the control.

summary.span: 設定關聯控制項樣板的值。

span.span: Sets the value of a template of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會在設計工具中的控制項或其保存表單中指定的範本設定可編輯區域`content`參數。The method sets an editable region in a designer to a control or template that is specified in its persisted form by the `content` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

value.span: ，包含關聯的 控制項中每個樣板的項目。

span.span: A containing an element for each template in the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性建構物件，並填入基底屬性所傳回的集合。The property constructs a object and populates it with the collection returned by the base property. 接著它會加入物件每個範本 (和) 相關聯的控制項。It then adds a object for each of the templates ( and ) of the associated control.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出設計工具是否應該使用暫存複本，而非與設計工具關聯的實際控制項，來產生設計階段標記。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為屬性一律會是`true`，設計工具會使用控制項，其中包含相關聯的暫存複本控制項以產生設計階段標記。Because the property is always `true`, the designer uses a control that contains a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 控制項不會影響任何持續性。The control does not affect any persistence for the . 如果屬性所覆寫以傳回`false`，設計工具會使用相關聯其本身，以產生設計階段標記。If the property were overridden to return `false`, the designer would use the associated itself to generate the design-time markup.

para.span: 您可以覆寫屬性，以傳回或要判定其是否有類別層級標示控制項為基礎的值物件。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class-level object.

para.span: 如果未覆寫，物件會忽略。

span.span: If the is not overridden, the object ignores the .
